text: Leptocyrtinus nitidus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1926 and is known from Samoa.BioLib.cz - Leptocyrtinus nitidus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Cyrtinini Category:Beetles described in 1926
title: Leptocyrtinus nitidus
